page.title: 04Halesworth Economics.
page.content: Halesworth is the focul point for the economic activity of an area within a five mile radius.The main economic activity is retail trade,followed by financial services provided by banks ,building societies,estate agents & accountants.There is a large service area dominated by 5 garages.Rapid growth of Halesworth over the last 20 years has meant that building companies and retail suppliers have been very active,as have building societies and estate agents.Matthews Turkey factory is a major employer in the area. Grain production and storage is the dominant agricultural activity.Industry has declined since the 1960'swhen Howard Rotavators employed up to 600 people but two small industrial sites have been provided to encourage the return of industry to Halesworth.
